content:
MetaType Class

Definition

Represents the mapping of a domain object type to the columns of a database table.

In this Article

public abstract class MetaType
Inheritance
System.Object
MetaType

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Constructors

MetaType()

Initializes a new instance of the MetaType class.

protected MetaType ();

Properties

Associations

Gets an enumeration of all the associations.

public abstract System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Data.Linq.Mapping.MetaAssociation> Associations { get; }
Value
ReadOnlyCollection<MetaAssociation>

A collection of associations.

CanInstantiate

Gets whether the underlying type can be instantiated as the result of a query.

public abstract bool CanInstantiate { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the underlying type can be instantiated as the result of a query; otherwise, false.

DataMembers

Gets an enumeration of all the data members (fields and properties).

public abstract System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Data.Linq.Mapping.MetaDataMember> DataMembers { get; }
Value
ReadOnlyCollection<MetaDataMember>

A collection of the data members.

DBGeneratedIdentityMember

Gets the member that represents the auto-generated identity column.

public abstract System.Data.Linq.Mapping.MetaDataMember DBGeneratedIdentityMember { get; }
Value
MetaDataMember

The member that represents the auto-generated identity column, or null if there is no auto-generated identity column.

DerivedTypes

Gets an enumeration of the immediate derived types in an inheritance hierarchy.

public abstract System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Data.Linq.Mapping.MetaType> DerivedTypes { get; }
Value
ReadOnlyCollection<MetaType>

An enumeration of meta-types.

Discriminator

Gets the member that represents the inheritance discriminator column.

public abstract System.Data.Linq.Mapping.MetaDataMember Discriminator { get; }
Value
MetaDataMember

The member that represents the inheritance discriminator column, or null if there is none.

HasAnyLoadMethod

Gets a value that indicates whether the current MetaType or any of its bases types has an OnLoaded method.

public abstract bool HasAnyLoadMethod { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the meta-type or any base meta-type has an OnLoaded method; otherwise, false.

HasAnyValidateMethod

Gets a value that indicates whether the MetaType or any of its bases types has an OnValidate method.

public abstract bool HasAnyValidateMethod { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the meta-type or any base meta-type has an OnValidate method; otherwise, false.

HasInheritance

Gets a value indicating whether the type is part of a mapped inheritance hierarchy.

public abstract bool HasInheritance { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the type is part of a mapped inheritance hierarchy; otherwise false.

HasInheritanceCode

Gets a value indicating whether this type defines an inheritance code.

public abstract bool HasInheritanceCode { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if this type defines an inheritance code; otherwise false.

HasUpdateCheck

Gets a value indicating whether the type has any persistent member that may require a test for optimistic concurrency conflicts.

public abstract bool HasUpdateCheck { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the type has any persistent member with an UpdateCheck policy other than UpdateCheck; otherwise false.

IdentityMembers

Gets an enumeration of all the data members that define the unique identity of the type.

public abstract System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Data.Linq.Mapping.MetaDataMember> IdentityMembers { get; }
Value
ReadOnlyCollection<MetaDataMember>

An enumeration of members that define the unique identity of the type.

InheritanceBase

Gets the base meta-type in the inheritance hierarchy.

public abstract System.Data.Linq.Mapping.MetaType InheritanceBase { get; }
Value
MetaType

The base meta-type for the current inheritance hierarchy.

InheritanceCode

Gets a value indicating whether this type defines an inheritance code.

public abstract object InheritanceCode { get; }
Value
System.Object

true if this type defines an inheritance code; otherwise false.

InheritanceDefault

Gets a value indicating whether this type is used as the default of an inheritance hierarchy.

public abstract System.Data.Linq.Mapping.MetaType InheritanceDefault { get; }
Value
MetaType

The metadata for the default type in the inheritance mapping.

InheritanceRoot

Gets the root type of the inheritance hierarchy.

public abstract System.Data.Linq.Mapping.MetaType InheritanceRoot { get; }
Value
MetaType

The root type.

InheritanceTypes

Gets a collection of all types that are defined by an inheritance hierarchy.

public abstract System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Data.Linq.Mapping.MetaType> InheritanceTypes { get; }
Value
ReadOnlyCollection<MetaType>

A collection of meta-types in the current inheritance hierarchy.

IsEntity

Gets a value indicating whether the MetaType is an entity type.

public abstract bool IsEntity { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the MetaType is an entity type; otherwise false.

IsInheritanceDefault

Gets a value indicating whether this type is used as the default of an inheritance hierarchy.

public abstract bool IsInheritanceDefault { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if this type is used as the default of an inheritance hierarchy; otherwise false.

Model

Gets the MetaModel that contains this MetaType.

public abstract System.Data.Linq.Mapping.MetaModel Model { get; }
Value
MetaModel

The containing meta-model.

Name

Gets the name of the MetaType.

public abstract string Name { get; }
Value
String

The name of the current meta-type.

Remarks

This name is the same as the name of the common language runtime (CLR) type.

OnLoadedMethod

Gets information about the OnLoaded method contained by this meta-type.

public abstract System.Reflection.MethodInfo OnLoadedMethod { get; }
Value
MethodInfo

A description of the OnLoaded method for this meta-type.

OnValidateMethod

Gets information about the OnValidate method contained by this meta-type.

public abstract System.Reflection.MethodInfo OnValidateMethod { get; }
Value
MethodInfo

A description of the OnValidate method for this meta-type.

PersistentDataMembers

Gets a collection of all the persistent data members.

public abstract System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Data.Linq.Mapping.MetaDataMember> PersistentDataMembers { get; }
Value
ReadOnlyCollection<MetaDataMember>

A collection of all the meta-data members in the current type.

Remarks

Persistent data members are those fields and properties that are mapped to database columns.

Table

Gets the MetaTable that uses this MetaType for row definition.

public abstract System.Data.Linq.Mapping.MetaTable Table { get; }
Value
MetaTable

A meta-table that uses the current meta-type for its row definition.

Type

Gets the underlying common language runtime (CLR) type.

public abstract Type Type { get; }
Value
Type

The associated CLR type.

VersionMember

Gets a row-version or timestamp column for this MetaType.

public abstract System.Data.Linq.Mapping.MetaDataMember VersionMember { get; }
Value
MetaDataMember

The meta-data member that represents the row-version or timestamp column for this meta-type, or null if there is none.

Methods

GetDataMember(MemberInfo)

Gets the MetaDataMember associated with the specified member.

public abstract System.Data.Linq.Mapping.MetaDataMember GetDataMember (System.Reflection.MemberInfo member);
member
MemberInfo

The member for which the associated MetaDataMember is sought.

Returns
MetaDataMember

The MetaDataMember if one is associated with the specified member; otherwise, null.

GetInheritanceType(Type)

Gets the MetaType for an inheritance subtype.

public abstract System.Data.Linq.Mapping.MetaType GetInheritanceType (Type type);
type
Type

The subtype.

Returns
MetaType

The MetaType for an inheritance subtype.

GetTypeForInheritanceCode(Object)

Gets the meta-type associated with the specified inheritance code.

public abstract System.Data.Linq.Mapping.MetaType GetTypeForInheritanceCode (object code);
code
System.Object

The inheritance code.

Returns
MetaType

The meta-type associated with the specified inheritance code.
